title: PreconditionsV2

Duration.description:
Duration is an XDR Typedef defines as:

```text typedef uint64 Duration; ```

LedgerBounds.description:
LedgerBounds is an XDR Struct defines as:

```text struct LedgerBounds { uint32 minLedger; uint32 maxLedger; // 0 here means no maxLedger }; ```

SequenceNumber.description:
SequenceNumber is an XDR Typedef defines as:

```text typedef int64 SequenceNumber; ```

TimeBounds.description:
TimeBounds is an XDR Struct defines as:

```text struct TimeBounds { TimePoint minTime; TimePoint maxTime; // 0 here means no maxTime }; ```

TimePoint.description:
TimePoint is an XDR Typedef defines as:

```text typedef uint64 TimePoint; ```
